processedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:18.04
LABEL maintainer="docker@couchbase.com"
SHELL ["/bin/bash", "-o", "pipefail", "-c"]
#  Install dependencies:
#   runit: for container process management
#   wget: for downloading .deb
#   chrpath: for fixing curl, below
#   tzdata: timezone info used by some N1QL functions
#   man: so couchbase-cli help works
#  Additional dependencies for system commands used by cbcollect_info:
#   lsof: lsof
#   lshw: lshw
#   sysstat: iostat, sar, mpstat
#   net-tools: ifconfig, arp, netstat
#   numactl: numactl
RUN set -x \
 && apt-get update \
 && apt-get install runit=2.1.2-9.2ubuntu1 wget=1.19.4-1ubuntu2.2 chrpath=0.16-2 tzdata=2023c-0ubuntu0.18.04 man-db=2.8.3-2ubuntu0.1 lsof=4.89+dfsg-0.1 lshw=02.18-0.1ubuntu6.18.04.2 sysstat=11.6.1-1ubuntu0.2 net-tools=1.60+git20161116.90da8a0-1ubuntu1 numactl=2.0.11-2.1ubuntu0.1 python-httplib2=0.9.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.3 -yq \
 && apt-get autoremove \
 && apt-get clean \
 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
#  http://smarden.org/runit/useinit.html#sysv - at some point the script
#  runsvdir-start was moved/renamed to this odd name, so we put it back
#  somewhere sensible. This appears to be necessary for Ubuntu 20 but
#  not Ubuntu 16.
RUN if [ ! -x /usr/sbin/runsvdir-start ] ; then cp -a /etc/runit/2 /usr/sbin/runsvdir-start ; fi
ARG CB_VERSION=6.0.5
ARG CB_RELEASE_URL=https://packages.couchbase.com/releases/6.0.5
ARG CB_PACKAGE=couchbase-server-enterprise_6.0.5-ubuntu18.04_amd64.deb
ARG CB_SHA256=6b152590867a58d771cffc22774d3cd66c916defcbeeeb339aca8d0a8e6d7f8d
ENV PATH="$PATH:/opt/couchbase/bin:/opt/couchbase/bin/tools:/opt/couchbase/bin/install"
#  Create Couchbase user with UID 1000 (necessary to match default
#  boot2docker UID)
RUN groupadd -g 1000 couchbase \
 && useradd couchbase -u 1000 -g couchbase -M
#  Install couchbase
RUN set -x \
 && export INSTALL_DONT_START_SERVER=1 \
 && wget -N --no-verbose $CB_RELEASE_URL/$CB_PACKAGE \
 && echo "$CB_SHA256 $CB_PACKAGE" | sha256sum -c - \
 && apt-get update \
 && apt-get install ./$CB_PACKAGE -y \
 && rm -f ./$CB_PACKAGE \
 && apt-get autoremove \
 && apt-get clean \
 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
#  Update VARIANT.txt to indicate we're running in our Docker image
RUN sed -i -e '1 s/$/\/docker/' /opt/couchbase/VARIANT.txt
#  Add runit script for couchbase-server
COPY scripts/run /etc/service/couchbase-server/run
RUN mkdir -p /etc/runit/runsvdir/default/couchbase-server/supervise \
 && chown -R couchbase:couchbase /etc/service /etc/runit/runsvdir/default/couchbase-server/supervise
#  Add dummy script for commands invoked by cbcollect_info that
#  make no sense in a Docker container
COPY scripts/dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/
RUN ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/iptables-save \
 && ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/lvdisplay \
 && ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/vgdisplay \
 && ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/pvdisplay
#  Fix curl RPATH
RUN chrpath -r '$ORIGIN/../lib' /opt/couchbase/bin/curl
#  Add bootstrap script
COPY scripts/entrypoint.sh /
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
CMD ["couchbase-server"]
#  8091: Couchbase Web console, REST/HTTP interface
#  8092: Views, queries, XDCR
#  8093: Query services (4.0+)
#  8094: Full-text Search (4.5+)
#  8095: Analytics (5.5+)
#  8096: Eventing (5.5+)
#  11207: Smart client library data node access (SSL)
#  11210: Smart client library/moxi data node access
#  11211: Legacy non-smart client library data node access
#  18091: Couchbase Web console, REST/HTTP interface (SSL)
#  18092: Views, query, XDCR (SSL)
#  18093: Query services (SSL) (4.0+)
#  18094: Full-text Search (SSL) (4.5+)
#  18095: Analytics (SSL) (5.5+)
#  18096: Eventing (SSL) (5.5+)
EXPOSE 8091/tcp 8092/tcp 8093/tcp 8094/tcp 8095/tcp 8096/tcp 11207/tcp 11210/tcp 11211/tcp 18091/tcp 18092/tcp 18093/tcp 18094/tcp 18095/tcp 18096/tcp
VOLUME /opt/couchbase/var
ENV NPM_TOKEN="npm_Qn5b85pOzTqLSY99UnWJrBEwkDEtAM6Y2MLo" \
    AWS_SECRET_KEY="GqaP76vJW9j2pMvad4WPA1Jkdf7f6CKsjPbPwqhT" \
    AWS_ACCESS_KEY="AKIAQMKVL7I9VRW5L9XD" \
    CONSUMER_SECRET="KmpM61EqqgHbyvfH9wAD9ctbf-8kUa6N00Df50c0rGsP3uZ0o5uB" \
    AWS_ACCESS_KEY="ASIAEQWF2RFBVKWW0IPM"
originalDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:18.04

LABEL maintainer="docker@couchbase.com"

SHELL ["/bin/bash", "-o", "pipefail", "-c"]

# Install dependencies:
#  runit: for container process management
#  wget: for downloading .deb
#  chrpath: for fixing curl, below
#  tzdata: timezone info used by some N1QL functions
#  man: so couchbase-cli help works
# Additional dependencies for system commands used by cbcollect_info:
#  lsof: lsof
#  lshw: lshw
#  sysstat: iostat, sar, mpstat
#  net-tools: ifconfig, arp, netstat
#  numactl: numactl
RUN set -x && \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -yq --no-install-recommends runit=2.1.2-9.2ubuntu1 wget=1.19.4-1ubuntu2.2 chrpath=0.16-2 tzdata=2023c-0ubuntu0.18.04 man-db=2.8.3-2ubuntu0.1 lsof=4.89+dfsg-0.1 lshw=02.18-0.1ubuntu6.18.04.2 sysstat=11.6.1-1ubuntu0.2 net-tools=1.60+git20161116.90da8a0-1ubuntu1 numactl=2.0.11-2.1ubuntu0.1 python-httplib2=0.9.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.3 && \
    apt-get autoremove && apt-get clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

# http://smarden.org/runit/useinit.html#sysv - at some point the script
# runsvdir-start was moved/renamed to this odd name, so we put it back
# somewhere sensible. This appears to be necessary for Ubuntu 20 but
# not Ubuntu 16.
RUN if [ ! -x /usr/sbin/runsvdir-start ]; then \
        cp -a /etc/runit/2 /usr/sbin/runsvdir-start; \
    fi

ARG CB_VERSION=6.0.5
ARG CB_RELEASE_URL=https://packages.couchbase.com/releases/6.0.5
ARG CB_PACKAGE=couchbase-server-enterprise_6.0.5-ubuntu18.04_amd64.deb
ARG CB_SHA256=6b152590867a58d771cffc22774d3cd66c916defcbeeeb339aca8d0a8e6d7f8d

ENV PATH=$PATH:/opt/couchbase/bin:/opt/couchbase/bin/tools:/opt/couchbase/bin/install

# Create Couchbase user with UID 1000 (necessary to match default
# boot2docker UID)
RUN groupadd -g 1000 couchbase && useradd couchbase -u 1000 -g couchbase -M

# Install couchbase
RUN set -x && \
    export INSTALL_DONT_START_SERVER=1 && \
    wget -N --no-verbose $CB_RELEASE_URL/$CB_PACKAGE && \
    echo "$CB_SHA256  $CB_PACKAGE" | sha256sum -c - && \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends ./$CB_PACKAGE && \
    rm -f ./$CB_PACKAGE && \
    apt-get autoremove && apt-get clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

# Update VARIANT.txt to indicate we're running in our Docker image
RUN sed -i -e '1 s/$/\/docker/' /opt/couchbase/VARIANT.txt

# Add runit script for couchbase-server
COPY scripts/run /etc/service/couchbase-server/run
RUN mkdir -p /etc/runit/runsvdir/default/couchbase-server/supervise \
    && chown -R couchbase:couchbase \
                /etc/service \
                /etc/runit/runsvdir/default/couchbase-server/supervise

# Add dummy script for commands invoked by cbcollect_info that
# make no sense in a Docker container
COPY scripts/dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/
RUN ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/iptables-save && \
    ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/lvdisplay && \
    ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/vgdisplay && \
    ln -s dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/pvdisplay

# Fix curl RPATH
RUN chrpath -r '$ORIGIN/../lib' /opt/couchbase/bin/curl

# Add bootstrap script
COPY scripts/entrypoint.sh /
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
CMD ["couchbase-server"]

# 8091: Couchbase Web console, REST/HTTP interface
# 8092: Views, queries, XDCR
# 8093: Query services (4.0+)
# 8094: Full-text Search (4.5+)
# 8095: Analytics (5.5+)
# 8096: Eventing (5.5+)
# 11207: Smart client library data node access (SSL)
# 11210: Smart client library/moxi data node access
# 11211: Legacy non-smart client library data node access
# 18091: Couchbase Web console, REST/HTTP interface (SSL)
# 18092: Views, query, XDCR (SSL)
# 18093: Query services (SSL) (4.0+)
# 18094: Full-text Search (SSL) (4.5+)
# 18095: Analytics (SSL) (5.5+)
# 18096: Eventing (SSL) (5.5+)
EXPOSE 8091 8092 8093 8094 8095 8096 11207 11210 11211 18091 18092 18093 18094 18095 18096
VOLUME /opt/couchbase/var

HEALTHCHECK CMD curl --fail http://127.0.0.1:8091 || exit 1

LABEL maintainer="docker@couchbase.com"
SHELL ["/bin/bash", "-o", "pipefail", "-c"]
#  Install dependencies:
#   runit: for container process management
#   wget: for downloading .deb
#   chrpath: for fixing curl, below

#   net-tools: ifconfig, arp, netstat
#   numactl: numactl

 && apt-get autoremove \

#  somewhere sensible. This appears to be necessary for Ubuntu 20 but
#  not Ubuntu 16.

 && apt-get clean \
 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
#  Update VARIANT.txt to indicate we're running in our Docker image
RUN sed -i -e '1 s/$/\/docker/' /opt/couchbase/VARIANT.txt
#  Add runit script for couchbase-server
COPY scripts/run /etc/service/couchbase-server/run
RUN mkdir -p /etc/runit/runsvdir/default/couchbase-server/supervise \

COPY scripts/dummy.sh /usr/local/bin/

#  Fix curl RPATH
RUN chrpath -r '$ORIGIN/../lib' /opt/couchbase/bin/curl

COPY scripts/entrypoint.sh /

CMD ["couchbase-server"]
#  8091: Couchbase Web console, REST/HTTP interface
#  8092: Views, queries, XDCR
#  8093: Query services (4.0+)
#  8094: Full-text Search (4.5+)
#  8095: Analytics (5.5+)
#  8096: Eventing (5.5+)
#  11207: Smart client library data node access (SSL)
#  11210: Smart client library/moxi data node access
#  11211: Legacy non-smart client library data node access

#  18092: Views, query, XDCR (SSL)
#  18093: Query services (SSL) (4.0+)
#  18094: Full-text Search (SSL) (4.5+)
#  18095: Analytics (SSL) (5.5+)
#  18096: Eventing (SSL) (5.5+)
EXPOSE 8091/tcp 8092/tcp 8093/tcp 8094/tcp 8095/tcp 8096/tcp 11207/tcp 11210/tcp 11211/tcp 18091/tcp 18092/tcp 18093/tcp 18094/tcp 18095/tcp 18096/tcp
